cause.description:
join this cause if you think that the legalization of marijuana would really do a lot of good to the world by raising the economy of poor country's and erasing all the drug dealers and help all the people with glaucoma, anorexia, people recovering from brain trauma, the people going through chemo therapy and all that stuff and if you like to smoke pot and wish it was legalized so it wouldn't be sketch when you see a cop and your stoned.
read on it.
http://www.askmen.com/sports/health/20_mens_health.html
http://www.mayoclinic.com/health/medical-marijuana/GA00014
1. legalization of marijuana is important
cause.name: Legalize the Dank
